title: Kids in league's these days
body:
0/3 Nasus top gets demolished, threatens to afk and actually does 

"i don't care if i get banned. You're toxic for calling me out on afking in base though)

Lee is 0/5/1 and instead of getting a double kill while he's sitting right next to me(literally 5 units away) he afks under tower 5 steps away from me and admits to it in chat
"you scared him off"

Why couldn't you move 5 steps to help me

"lol everyone report yorick"

Man what is it with bad players these days
